review.description: My favorite new spot in the neighborhood. Staff is very friendly and attentive and the food is excellent. I had the pumpkin curry and it was awesome. I can't recommend this place highly enough - and its BYOB
review.author: T C.

review.description: This new restaurant is in a beautiful and comfortable setting. The menu offers fresh and artfully prepared food. The staff is helpful and friendly. This is a great addition to montage street eateries.
review.author: Joyce p.

review.description: If Per Se served Khao Soi chicken it would look and taste like this. Superb one of a kind upscale-casual Thai restaurant.
review.author: Sean B.

review.description: I have been for dinner and lunch the food and service both times were excellent. I think the quality and. Standard of the food for the price is excellent great quality great value. I look forward to my next visit
review.author: Mark H.
